Hi Levi,

>> I would recommend writing a totally orthogonal spike.
> Huh?

Finally, I got it!
English translation: "orthogonal spike" --> a small, independent test.
  Neat.

>The interesting part of this whole exercise (in my mind anyway)
>was figuring out what a "reasonable" test-fixture for working w/
>rmi might look like.

Your mind exercise is going to be my invaluable learning tool, and I am 
eternally grateful for it.  I can't say I completely understand it at the 
moment but I will go over it line by line, and play with it some more for the 
next few days.

Thanks Levi, you've been a big help.

Sam
